events.message: We have successfully received your application for the software engineer position. Our team will review your details shortly and get back to you with the next steps.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department for software developer roles. Our recruitment team is now preparing for the initial screening.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to your case. You can expect a call soon to discuss your background and interest in the software engineering position.
The initial screening interview was completed with positive feedback. You demonstrated strong knowledge of software development principles and relevant technologies.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 10 AM UTC. This interview will assess your coding skills, problem-solving abilities, and software architecture understanding.
The technical interview was successfully completed and the interviewers gave excellent feedback regarding your coding skills and systems design knowledge.
We have scheduled your HR interview for May 25th at 3 PM UTC. This session will cover company culture, benefits, and other general questions.
Your HR interview went well. The HR team appreciated your enthusiasm and alignment with company values, bringing you one step closer to an offer.
We are pleased to propose you an offer for the Software Engineer position. The offer details including compensation and benefits have been sent to your email.
You have provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed enthusiasm to join our engineering team. We are excited to have you onboard.
Congratulations on accepting the offer! We are happy to welcome you to our team and will initiate the onboarding process immediately.
Your onboarding has officially started. Our HR and Engineering teams will support you through orientation, setting up your development environment, and initial training.
The hiring process is now complete. Welcome aboard as a full-time software engineer. We look forward to your contributions and success within our engineering department.
